settings.language.label: Language
settings.note: Toggle to enable/disable the RPG Companion extension. Configure additional settings within the panel itself.
template.settingsModal.displayNote: You can enable/disable the entire RPG Companion extension in the Extensions tab of the SillyTavern.
template.settingsModal.display.toggleAut: Automatically refresh RPG info after each message.
template.settingsModal.display.showUserS: Enable User Stats that track your persona's statistics, mood, attributes, skills, etc.
template.settingsModal.display.showInfoB: Display location, time, weather, and recent events.
template.settingsModal.display.showPrese: Display character portraits with their current thoughts and status.
template.settingsModal.display.narratorM: Use character card as narrator. Infer characters from context instead of using fixed character references.
template.settingsModal.display.showInven: Track items carried, clothing worn, stored items, and assets.
template.settingsModal.display.showQuest: Manage main and optional quests with objectives.
template.settingsModal.display.showLockI: Display lock/unlock icons on tracker items to prevent AI from modifying them.
template.settingsModal.display.showThoug: Display character thoughts as overlay bubbles next to their messages.
template.settingsModal.display.alwaysSho: Auto-expand thought bubble without clicking the icon first
template.settingsModal.display.enableAni: Smooth transitions for stats, content updates, and dice rolls.
template.settingsModal.display.showImmer: Display a toggle button to enable/disable HTML formatting in messages.
template.settingsModal.display.showDialo: Display a toggle button to enable/disable colored dialogue formatting.
template.settingsModal.display.showSpoti: Display Spotify music player with AI-suggested scene-appropriate tracks.
template.settingsModal.display.showDynam: Display a toggle button to enable/disable animated weather effects.
template.settingsModal.display.showNarra: Display a toggle button to enable/disable narrator mode (infer characters from context).
template.settingsModal.display.showAutoA: Display a toggle button to automatically generate avatars for characters without images.
template.settingsModal.display.showRando: Display button for AI-generated random plot progression prompts.
template.settingsModal.display.showNatur: Display button for context-aware narrative continuation prompts.
template.settingsModal.display.showStart: Display button to initiate interactive combat encounters.
template.settingsModal.display.showDiceD: Display the "Last Roll" indicator in the panel.
template.settingsModal.advanced.encounte: Number of recent messages to include in combat initialization.
template.settingsModal.advanced.autoSave: Save detailed combat logs to file for future reference and analysis.
template.settingsModal.advanced.clearCac: Clears committed and displayed tracker data for your currently active chat.
template.settingsModal.advanced.generati: Together: Adds RPG tracking to main roleplay. Separate: Generates RPG data separately (manual or auto). External: Connects to an OpenAI-compatible endpoint directly.
template.settingsModal.advanced.external: OpenAI-compatible endpoint (e.g., OpenAI, OpenRouter, local LLM server).
Your API key for the external service.
template.settingsModal.advanced.contextM: Number of recent messages to include.
template.settingsModal.advanced.useSepar: Use model connected to RPG Companion Trackers preset

When enabled, tracker generation will use the model from the "RPG Companion Trackers" preset instead of your main API model. The preset will be switched automatically during generation and restored afterward. Select the desired model in that preset and make sure the "Bind presets to API connections" toggle is on (next to the import/export preset buttons).
template.settingsModal.advanced.skipInje: Always for guided or quiet prompts

When set, the extension will not inject tracker prompts, examples, or HTML instructions according to the selected mode when a guided generation (via `instruct` or `quiet_prompt`) is detected. Useful when using GuidedGenerations or similar extensions.
template.settingsModal.advanced.customHt: Customize the HTML prompt injected when "Enable Immersive HTML" is enabled. The default prompt is shown above - you can edit it directly or replace it entirely. Click "Restore Default" to reset. This affects all generation modes (together, separate, and plot progression).
template.settingsModal.advanced.resetFab: Resets all floating action buttons (toggle, refresh, debug) to default top-left positions. Useful if buttons are off-screen.
template.trackerEditorModal.title: Edit Trackers
template.trackerEditorModal.messages.exp: Failed to export tracker preset. Check console for details.
template.trackerEditorModal.messages.imp: This will replace your current tracker configuration. Continue?
template.trackerEditorModal.userStatsTab: If disabled, attributes are only sent when a dice roll is active.
template.trackerEditorModal.presentChara: Define relationship types with corresponding emojis shown on character portraits.
Create stats to track for each character (displayed as colored bars).
template.mainPanel.title: RPG Companion
infobox.noData.title: No data yet
infobox.noData.instruction: Generate a new response in the roleplay or switch to "Separate Generation" in Settings to access and click the "Refresh RPG Info" button
infobox.recentEvents.title: Recent Events
inventory.onPerson.title: Items Currently Carried
inventory.clothing.title: Clothing & Armor
inventory.stored.title: Storage Locations
inventory.stored.empty: No storage locations yet. Click "Add Location" to create one.
inventory.stored.confirmRemoveLocationMe: Remove "${location}"? This will delete all items stored there.
inventory.assets.title: Vehicles, Property & Major Possessions
inventory.assets.description: Assets include vehicles (cars, motorcycles), property (homes, apartments), and major equipment (workshop tools, special items).
quests.main.title: Main Quests
quests.main.hint: The main quest represents your primary objective in the story.
quests.optional.title: Optional Quests
quests.optional.hint: Optional quests are side objectives that complement your main story.
checkpoint.tooltip: Messages before this point are excluded from context
musicPlayer.title: Scene Music
musicPlayer.noMusic: AI will suggest music when appropriate for the scene
errors.parsingError: RPG Companion Trackers' parsing error! The model returned an incorrect format. If the issue persists, consider changing the model for generations.
settings.recommendedModels.title: Recommended Models
settings.recommendedModels.description: For the extension to work properly, **it is not recommended to use any models below 20B, especially if they're old.** It works best with the SOTA models such as Deepseek, Claude, GPT, or Gemini.
template.settingsModal.display.showLocat: Display button to open and manage interactive location maps.
map.modal.title: Location Map
map.modal.noMapsHint: Create a new map to get started!
map.modal.selectMapHint: Select a map from the dropdown or create a new one
map.locationTracker.title: Location Tracker
map.createDialog.title: Create New Map
map.deleteConfirm.title: Delete Map
map.deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this map? This action cannot be undone.
map.generation.error: Failed to generate map. Please try again.
map.generation.parseError: Failed to parse map data. The AI response was in an unexpected format.
map.moveCharacter.title: Move Character
map.importExport.importError: Failed to import map. Invalid format.
map.importExport.confirmImport: This will add the imported map to your collection. Continue?
